column2: # Customized functions can then be called in the.functions just like established methods.

dt.calculate(dt.name = "dat", the.variables = c("Sepal.Length", "Sepal.Width"), the.functions = c("mean", "sd", "triple mean"), grouping.variables = "Species", table.format = "long", return.as = "all")

"dat[, .(variable = c('Sepal.Length', 'Sepal.Width'), mean = lapply(X = .SD, FUN = 'mean'), sd = lapply(X = .SD, FUN = 'sd'), `triple mean` = lapply(X = .SD, FUN = 'triple mean')), .SDcols = c('Sepal.Length', 'Sepal.Width'), keyby = Species]"
